title: A vaccine for cancer
intro: Could a cancer vaccine soon be a reality? Beth and Neil discuss this and teach you some new vocabulary.
this_week_question: Which disease did the first successful vaccine treat?
a) flu b) polio, or c) smallpox
Listen to the programme to hear the answer.

vocab.desc: several or many; used to add credibility to what you are saying
used to encourage people to move or look away from something, or to stop them from paying it much attention
take control of something that does not belong to you for your own advantage
completely fail to notice or realise the threat of something
teach somebody to think or behave in a new or different way
